name: SCENE
short_description:
SCENE is a web service middleware which provides a basic platform to develop, deploy, execute, manage, and monitor web service applications. SCENE includes four sub-systems: SCENE-WSRuntime, SCENE-WSDT, SCENE-WSManager, SCENE-BPELDesigner.
SCENE-WSRuntime: Support for deploying and executing web service applications. It natively supports the full WS protocol stack.
SCENE-WSDT: Support for developing web service applications.
SCENE-WSManager: Support for managing SCENE-WSRuntime and monitoring web service applications.
SCENE-BPELDesigner: Support for developing BPEL applications.
summary: SCENE is a Web Services-based Application Supporting Environment.
